     Genre    : Drama | Romance                
                                               
                                               
                                               
The year is 1953. A visiting archaeologist     
called Varun Shrivastav comes to the village   
of Manikpur in West Bengal to excavate the     
temple grounds of the local Zamindar. With     
knowledge and experience beyond his young      
demeanour, Varun greatly impresses the Zamindar
and his family. Especially Pakhi, the Zamindar'
feisty and only daughter, who finds herself    
irrevocably drawn towards him. But Varun isn't 
all he seems on the surface.
